document_data.name: Vaundyr
document_data.mainbody: '''Vaundyr''' was a vine that grew in southwestern [[Faer√ªn]].{{Cite dungeon/195/Eye on the Realms: Spellslayer Wine|2}}
document_data.Description: The vaundyr vine grew thickly in wet, shady locations. Its leaves were small, green, and waxy.
document_data.Availability: The vine could be found growing in [[Amn]], [[Calimshan]], and [[Tethyr]] and in the [[Dragon Coast]] lands.
document_data.Usage: '''Alarvaun''' was an [[herb]] made from vaundyr leaves. It was one of the ingredients in [[spellslayer wine]], which was developed in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
